name: TI_2_1_2_8_Extraordinary_User_Access__Break_the_Glass__Security_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.2.8 Extraordinary User Access (Break the Glass) Security Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track extraordinary user access (break the glass).
purpose: Capture extraordinary user access (break the glass), both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.8#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when extraordinary access is successful (e.g., "break the glass" scenario).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.8#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.8#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.8#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.8#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.8#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.8#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.8#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the rationale for extraordinary user access.
